Summary: Black triangle move from east to west.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Waukegan
There were no other sightings in Waukegan on or around November 8th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsBefore this black triangle, i witnessed and reported to MUFON about a classical disc. That was a night or two when i had seen this black triangle. The object gave off a static feeling that got my attention, than i got the idea to look up and there was something moving 4 miles an hour. It had those pulsating engine light circles underneath it. 6 or so of the orange'ish circles. It was moving toward Lake Michigan. From east to west. I tried getting my neibhors up to get a look, but no one answered their doors. i assume i was going to tell 'em that they just missed the UFO (again), or they were to sleepy to get up. Nothing more happened that night.
